title: #ICYMI | Little Max reviews a Jag, BMW M8 Gran Coupe - Top motoring stories of the day
text:
The BMW M8 Gran Coupe will be making its way to local shores next year, find out more about the sleek, four-door missile.



Ernest Page goes for a drive with Max Tuck (who was 7-years-old at the time) and the youngster gives his thoughts on a Jaguar F-Type 400 Sport. His comments are hilarious.

Wheels24 reader Frans Esterhuyse sent in some of his cartoon car artwork.

Uber drivers might dominated by males in the industry at present, but a mother of three in India is changing the stereotype of her profession.

Not to be missed

If you're possibly in the market to buy a pre-owned SUV, there are a number of options to consider below the R475 000 mark.

WATCH | This car review is so cute! Little Max Tuck explores the Jaguar F-Type 400 Sport

Click on the links below to read the full article:
description: From driving a car without oil to having a 7-year old review a Jaguar F-Type 400, here are the top motoring stories of the day.
